name: Druid: Test of faith
description:
The game will tell you the story of Morkvar's apprentice, a young but promising druid, on whose shoulders lays a huge responsibility for the fate of this fantasy world. Dark elves, humans, and the spirits of the four elements will accompany and help the protagonist throughout the story.

Druid: Test of faith - Is a classic metroidvania genre game, set in a huge, interconnected 2D world. Explore deep caves, cities of different species and races, deadly deserts, fight animals corrupted with madness, and help your new friends on their way to save this world.

Druid: Test of faith - Is a beautiful pleasant handcrafted 2D animation game.
